description:
There are a lot of smart cats throughout history, but it takes a lot to be deified as a god of learning! Learn about how the scholarly Sugawara no Michizane earned his reputation for wisdom, and how his influence extended into well after his death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Heavenly Scholar, Sugawara no Michizane!
天神様だぞ, 菅原道真!
